title: Anthropic: Persona Vectors
summary:
Anthropic's research introduces "persona vectors," a method for understanding and controlling character traits in large language models (LLMs). These vectors represent patterns of neural network activity corresponding to specific personality traits like "evil," "sycophancy," and "hallucination." By identifying these vectors, researchers can monitor, mitigate, and predict personality shifts in LLMs.

The process involves automatically generating prompts to elicit opposing behaviors for a trait, then identifying the difference in neural activity. These vectors can be injected into the model to "steer" its behavior, confirming their influence.

Persona vectors enable monitoring personality changes during deployment, potentially alerting developers to undesirable drifts. They can also be used to mitigate negative traits acquired during training. A counterintuitive "vaccine" approach involves steering the model *towards* undesirable traits during training, making it more resilient to acquiring them from problematic data. This method preserves model capabilities better than steering against the trait after training.

Finally, persona vectors can flag problematic training data by predicting how the data will impact a model's personality before training even begins. The research demonstrated the effectiveness of this flagging technique on real-world datasets. The findings suggest that persona vectors offer a promising path toward ensuring LLMs remain aligned with human values and behave as intended.
chinese_title: Anthropic：角色向量
chinese_summary:
Anthropic 研究引入“人格向量”，这是一种理解和控制大型语言模型 (LLM) 中角色特性的方法。这些向量代表与特定人格特征（如“邪恶”、“奉承”和“幻觉”）相对应的神经网络活动模式。通过识别这些向量，研究人员可以监测、缓解和预测 LLM 中的人格转变。

该过程涉及自动生成提示来引出某种特性的对立行为，然后识别神经活动中的差异。这些向量可以注入到模型中以“引导”其行为，从而确认其影响。

人格向量能够监测部署期间的人格变化，从而可能提醒开发者注意不良漂移。它们还可以用于缓解训练期间获得的负面特征。一种违反直觉的“疫苗”方法包括在训练期间将模型*引导至*不良特征，使其更具弹性，不易从有问题的数据中获取这些特征。与训练后引导对抗该特征相比，此方法能更好地保留模型能力。

最后，人格向量可以通过预测数据在训练开始前将如何影响模型的人格来标记有问题的数据。该研究证明了这种标记技术在真实数据集上的有效性。研究结果表明，人格向量为确保 LLM 保持与人类价值观的一致性并按预期行事提供了一条有希望的途径。

title: If you're remote, ramble
summary:
This article advocates for "ramblings" channels in team chat apps to foster connection and idea generation within remote teams of 2-10 people. These channels, acting as personal journals or microblogs, allow teammates to share thoughts, ideas, and updates without disrupting group channels.

Each team member has their own "ramblings" channel, named after them, where they can post updates 1-3 times a week. These posts can include project ideas, reflections on articles, "what if" scenarios, personal photos, or even problem-solving attempts. Others can reply to these posts in threads, facilitating discussion.

The "ramblings" channels are grouped in a dedicated "Ramblings" section and are muted by default, alleviating pressure to read every post. This encourages deep focus while still providing a space for informal communication, serving as a virtual "water cooler."

The author, who implemented "ramblings" at Obsidian two years ago, highlights that this system has become a valuable tool for staying connected and generating innovative ideas. The casual and unstructured nature of these channels has led to the emergence of feature ideas, prototypes, and creative solutions. These ramblings help maintain human connection between the team's annual in-person meetups.
chinese_title: 如果你是远程办公，那就漫谈吧。
chinese_summary:
本文提倡在团队聊天应用中设置“随笔”频道，以促进 2-10 人的远程团队内部的联系和创意产生。 这些频道就像个人日记或微博，允许队友分享想法、见解和更新，而不会打断群组频道。

每个团队成员都有自己以自己名字命名的“随笔”频道，他们可以在其中每周发布 1-3 次更新。 这些帖子可以包括项目想法、对文章的反思、“如果……会怎样”的情景、个人照片，甚至解决问题的尝试。其他人可以在这些帖子下方的评论区回复，促进讨论。

“随笔”频道被归类在专门的“随笔”部分，并且默认静音，从而减轻了阅读每篇帖子的压力。 这鼓励深度专注，同时仍然为非正式沟通提供空间，充当虚拟“茶水间”。

作者两年前在 Obsidian 实施了“随笔”，他强调这个系统已经成为保持联系和产生创新想法的宝贵工具。 这些频道的随意性和非结构化性质促成了功能想法、原型和创造性解决方案的出现。 这些随笔有助于在团队年度线下聚会之间保持人际联系。

title: The Fulbright Program: Chock Full of Bright Ideas
summary:
This blog post highlights the author's positive experience hosting a Fulbright scholar, Emily Simons, and argues for the continued funding of the Fulbright Program. The author initially collaborated with Emily on a healthcare-related project that ultimately fell through. However, Emily quickly adapted and contributed significantly to other projects, including work on physician-patient referral networks and graph learning datasets, culminating in a joint publication at ICML 2025. Beyond research, Emily also improved the lab's dissemination strategies, repositories, and website.

The author emphasizes that the true value of the Fulbright Program extends beyond quantifiable research outcomes. It lies in connecting bright minds, fostering intellectual enrichment, and creating opportunities for cross-cultural understanding and innovation. The author urges policymakers to recognize the long-term benefits of such programs, arguing against short-sighted funding cuts driven by a commodification of research. By connecting people, the Fulbright program creates unseen opportunities, change, and innovation across cultural borders. The author strongly supports these kinds of programs.
chinese_title: 富布赖特项目：满载奇思妙想
chinese_summary:
这篇博文讲述了作者接待富布赖特学者艾米丽·西蒙斯的积极体验，并呼吁继续资助富布赖特项目。作者最初与艾米丽合作开展一个医疗保健相关项目，但最终未能成功。然而，艾米丽迅速适应并为其他项目做出了重大贡献，包括医生-患者转诊网络和图学习数据集的研究，最终在ICML 2025上共同发表了一篇论文。除了研究之外，艾米丽还改进了实验室的传播策略、知识库和网站。

作者强调，富布赖特项目的真正价值远不止于可量化的研究成果，它在于连接聪明才智，促进智力提升，并为跨文化理解和创新创造机会。作者敦促决策者认识到此类项目的长期利益，反对因研究商品化而导致的目光短浅的资金削减。通过连接人，富布赖特项目在文化边界之间创造了看不见的机会、变革和创新。作者强烈支持此类项目。

title: Twenty Eighth International Obfuscated C Code Contest
summary:
The 28th International Obfuscated C Code Contest (IOCCC28) marked its 40th anniversary and the end of a 4-year hiatus. The contest saw significant improvements, including a rebuilt website, new registration and submission processes, and the mkiocccentry toolkit. These changes aimed to streamline the contest and reduce the time between winner selection and code release; the source code was released within 2 hours of the announcement on a YouTube show.

IOCCC28 had a record-breaking 23 winners, reflecting a high quantity and quality of submissions. While the code size limit increased, many entries were well under the limit, suggesting that originality and obfuscation skills are valued more than sheer size. The rules and guidelines will be improved for IOCCC29, planned for December 2025.

The announcement highlights several winning entries, including a small LLM inference engine (cable1), a polite editor (howe), a one-liner with magic numbers (stedolan), a C-preprocessor intensive image renderer (endoh1), an exploration of virtual machines (mills and macke), and an Intel 4004 emulator (carlini). The article also touches on common pitfalls that prevented some submissions from winning, such as reliance on ASLR, resembling past entries too closely, and poor handling of modern C compilers. It encourages submitters to keep trying and provides resources for compiling, running, and fixing issues with winning entries.
chinese_title: 第二十八届国际C语言混乱代码大赛
chinese_summary:
第28届国际C语言混乱代码大赛(IOCCC28)迎来了其40周年纪念以及四年中断后的回归。 本次大赛有了显著的改进，包括重建的网站、新的注册和提交流程以及mkiocccentry工具包。 这些改变旨在简化比赛流程，并缩短获奖者选定和代码发布之间的时间； 源代码在YouTube节目中宣布后的2小时内就发布了。

IOCCC28有创纪录的23位获奖者，反映了提交作品的高质量和高数量。 虽然代码大小限制有所增加，但许多参赛作品远低于该限制，这表明原创性和混淆技巧比单纯的代码大小更受重视。 计划于2025年12月举行的IOCCC29的规则和指南将会得到改进。

公告重点介绍了几个获奖作品，包括小型LLM推理引擎 (cable1)、一个礼貌的编辑器 (howe)、一个带有幻数的单行代码 (stedolan)、一个C预处理器密集型图像渲染器 (endoh1)、一个对虚拟机的探索 (mills and macke) 以及一个Intel 4004模拟器 (carlini)。 文章还提到了阻止一些提交作品获胜的常见陷阱，例如依赖ASLR、与过去的参赛作品过于相似以及对现代C编译器的处理不佳。 它鼓励提交者继续尝试，并提供用于编译、运行和修复获奖作品问题的资源。

title: Helsinki records zero traffic deaths for full year
summary:
Helsinki has achieved a remarkable milestone: a full year without any traffic-related fatalities. City and police officials attribute this success to long-term planning, infrastructure improvements, and reduced speed limits. Over half of Helsinki's streets now have a 30 km/h speed limit, and areas around schools have also been reduced.

Redesigned street layouts, pedestrian crossings, and expanded cycling and walking infrastructure contribute to increased safety by separating vulnerable road users. Improved traffic enforcement through automated systems and targeted patrols has also played a key role. The city's excellent public transport system reduces car usage, further minimizing accidents.

Beyond fatalities, Helsinki has seen a significant decrease in injury-causing accidents, dropping from nearly 1,000 annually in the late 1980s to 277 in the past year. The city's traffic safety strategy, running from 2022 to 2026, focuses on protecting pedestrians, children, and cyclists, supported by data-driven planning.

While electric scooters presented a challenge, Helsinki has responded with adjusted parking rules and speed restrictions. Officials also credited the positive behaviour and awareness of all road users for the achievement.

Aligned with the EU's Vision Zero goal of eliminating traffic fatalities by 2050, Helsinki uses this target to guide daily decision-making and assess the long-term impact of its initiatives.
chinese_title: 赫尔辛基全年实现零交通死亡
chinese_summary:
赫尔辛基创下瞩目成就：全年实现交通事故零死亡。城市和警方官员将这一成功归功于长期规划、基础设施改善和降低限速。目前，赫尔辛基超过一半的街道限速为30公里/小时，学校周边区域的限速也已降低。

重新设计的街道布局、人行横道以及扩大的自行车和步行基础设施通过分隔弱势道路使用者，提高了安全性。通过自动化系统和有针对性的巡逻来加强交通执法也发挥了关键作用。该市完善的公共交通系统减少了汽车使用，进一步减少了事故。

除了死亡人数外，赫尔辛基的受伤事故也大幅减少，从1980年代后期的每年近1000起降至去年的277起。该市2022年至2026年的交通安全战略侧重于保护行人、儿童和骑自行车者，并以数据驱动的规划为支持。

虽然电动滑板车带来了一项挑战，但赫尔辛基已通过调整停车规则和速度限制做出回应。官员们还将所有道路使用者的积极行为和意识归功于这一成就。

为了实现欧盟到2050年消除交通事故死亡的“零愿景”目标，赫尔辛基利用这一目标来指导日常决策，并评估其举措的长期影响。

title: Imaging reveals intricate tattoos of 2,500-year-old Siberian ice mummy
summary:
High-resolution imaging has revealed intricate tattoos on a 2,500-year-old Siberian "ice mummy," providing insights into the culture and practices of the nomadic Pazyryk people. The tattoos, depicting animals like leopards, stags, roosters, and mythical creatures, were found on the woman's arms and hands, showcasing a sophisticated level of artistry.

Researchers collaborated with a tattooist specializing in ancient methods to understand how the tattoos were created. The scans revealed detailed and uniform tattooing, suggesting skilled craftsmanship. The team believes the tattoos were likely stenciled onto the skin before being applied using needle-like tools made from animal horn or bone, with pigment derived from burnt plant material or soot.

Analysis suggests varying quality between tattoos on different arms, possibly indicating different artists or mistakes.  The time commitment involved in creating the tattoos highlights their significance. While some tattoos were damaged during burial preparation, the study suggests their importance was primarily for the living. The mummies were discovered in ice tombs in the Altai Mountains, and the research sheds light on the advanced skills and cultural practices of the Pazyryk people.
chinese_title: 成像揭示2500年前西伯利亚冰冻木乃伊精美纹身
chinese_summary:
高分辨率成像揭示了一具2500年前西伯利亚“冰冻木乃伊”身上精美的纹身，为了解游牧的巴泽雷克文化和习俗提供了线索。这些纹身位于该女性的手臂和手上，描绘了豹、鹿、公鸡和神话生物等动物，展现了高超的艺术水平。

研究人员与一位专精于古代方法的纹身师合作，以了解纹身是如何创作的。扫描结果显示纹身精细且均匀，表明其工艺精湛。研究小组认为，这些纹身很可能先用模具印在皮肤上，然后使用动物角或骨头制成的针状工具进行纹刺，颜料则来源于烧焦的植物材料或烟灰。

分析表明，不同手臂上的纹身质量参差不齐，可能表明是不同的艺术家所为或存在失误。创作纹身所花费的时间凸显了它们的重要性。虽然一些纹身在埋葬准备过程中受损，但研究表明它们的重要性主要体现在生者身上。这些木乃伊是在阿尔泰山脉的冰墓中发现的，这项研究揭示了巴泽雷克人先进的技能和文化习俗。

title: Converge (YC S23) well-capitalized New York startup seeks product developers
summary:
Converge, a well-capitalized New York startup from YC S23, is seeking product developers to join their lean team of 6. They boast a strong product-market fit, evidenced by >$1M ARR, >200 customers, and high daily user engagement (33%). This translates to significant impact for new hires, who will own entire products and see immediate customer feedback.

Converge tackles engineering challenges at scale, processing 20M daily customer interactions and $3B in GMV annually, competing with giants like Segment and Fivetran. The company emphasizes urgency, deep understanding, humility, and simplicity in its values.

They discourage candidates who prefer managing over building, endless design reviews, chasing hype, pivoting, seeking heavy mentorship, or remote work. The founding team, consisting of Jan-Henrik (CEO), Jerome (COO), and Thomas (CTO), emphasizes a hands-on approach, with all founders having written production code. The team highlights their close relationships and diverse backgrounds.

title: A Real PowerBook: The Macintosh Application Environment on a Pa-RISC Laptop
summary:
This article explores the RDI PrecisionBook, a rare PA-RISC laptop from 1997, and its ability to run Macintosh applications via Apple's Macintosh Application Environment. The author highlights that while PowerPC was the expected successor to the Motorola 68000 for Macintosh, the PrecisionBook offered an alternative using Hewlett-Packard's PA-RISC architecture.

The PrecisionBook, positioned against the PowerBook 3400c, boasted advantages like a higher resolution display, larger keyboard, and more RAM, but was significantly more expensive. Its key feature was running HP-UX alongside a Macintosh System 7.5.3 desktop, allowing users to run 68K Mac software.

The article details RDI's history as a SPARC laptop manufacturer before diversifying to PA-RISC. The PrecisionBook was essentially a portable HP Visualize workstation, using the same components and even identifying as the same model.  The author’s specific machine, nicknamed "ruby," featured a 160MHz PA-7300LC processor and 256MB (later upgraded to 512MB) of RAM.

Further described are the laptop's various features, including its status LCD panel, battery life, ports, and graphics capabilities. It had dual hard drive bays, PCMCIA slots, and external connectivity options. The article also touches on the machine's boot process and the technical specifications of the PA-7300LC processor. Ultimately, the author sets the stage to explore the performance and underpinnings of running the Macintosh Application Environment on this unusual piece of hardware.
chinese_title: 真正的PowerBook：在PA-RISC笔记本电脑上的Macintosh应用程序环境
chinese_summary:
本文探讨了RDI PrecisionBook，一款1997年罕见的PA-RISC笔记本电脑，以及它通过苹果的Macintosh应用程序环境运行Macintosh应用程序的能力。作者强调，虽然PowerPC是Macintosh的摩托罗拉68000处理器的预期继任者，但PrecisionBook提供了一种使用惠普PA-RISC架构的替代方案。

PrecisionBook的定位是与PowerBook 3400c竞争，它拥有更高的分辨率显示器、更大的键盘和更多的RAM等优势，但价格也明显更高。其主要特点是运行HP-UX的同时，运行Macintosh System 7.5.3桌面，从而允许用户运行68K Mac软件。

文章详细介绍了RDI在多元化到PA-RISC之前作为SPARC笔记本电脑制造商的历史。PrecisionBook本质上是一台便携式HP Visualize工作站，使用相同的组件，甚至识别为同一型号。作者的特定机器，昵称为“ruby”，配备了160MHz PA-7300LC处理器和256MB（后来升级到512MB）的RAM。

文章进一步描述了该笔记本电脑的各种功能，包括其状态LCD面板、电池寿命、端口和图形功能。它具有双硬盘驱动器托架、PCMCIA插槽和外部连接选项。文章还提到了机器的启动过程和PA-7300LC处理器的技术规格。最终，作者为探索在这个不寻常的硬件上运行Macintosh应用程序环境的性能和基础做好了准备。

title: The Ski Rental Problem
summary:
This article explains the "ski rental problem," a classic online algorithm problem where you must decide whether to rent or buy skis without knowing how many days you'll ski. Renting costs $1 per day, and buying costs $B.

The optimal offline algorithm (knowing the number of ski days, *k*) is to buy if *k* ≥ *B* and rent otherwise, costing min(*k*, *B*). A simple online algorithm is to buy after renting for *B* days, resulting in a competitive ratio of 2 (meaning it's at most twice as bad as the optimal offline solution).

The article then explores a randomized algorithm to potentially improve the competitive ratio. This algorithm buys skis on day *i+1* with probability *P<sub>i</sub>*. By approximating the discrete probabilities with a continuous probability density function *P(x)*, the goal is to find an optimal *P(x)* that minimizes the competitive ratio.  Using calculus, the article derives the optimal probability distribution: *P(x) = e<sup>x/B</sup> / (B(e-1))* for *x < B* and 0 otherwise. This leads to an expected competitive ratio of approximately *e / (e - 1)*, which is better than the simple deterministic algorithm.  The article includes Python code to simulate the randomized strategy, although acknowledging it is approximating a discrete solution with a continuous one. Finally, it posits that the algorithm could be helpful if similar decisions must be made repeatedly.
chinese_title: 滑雪租赁问题
chinese_summary:
本文解释了“滑雪板租赁问题”，这是一个经典的在线算法问题，你必须决定租用还是购买滑雪板，但不知道你会滑多少天。租用每天花费1美元，购买花费B美元。

最优离线算法（知道滑雪天数*k*）是在*k* ≥ *B*时购买，否则租用，花费min(*k*, *B*)。一个简单的在线算法是在租用*B*天后购买，这导致竞争比率为2（意味着它最多比最优离线解决方案差两倍）。

然后，本文探讨了一种随机算法，以潜在地提高竞争比率。该算法在第*i+1*天以概率*P<sub>i</sub>*购买滑雪板。通过使用连续概率密度函数*P(x)*来近似离散概率，目标是找到一个最小化竞争比率的最优*P(x)*。使用微积分，本文推导出最优概率分布：*P(x) = e<sup>x/B</sup> / (B(e-1))*，当*x < B*时，否则为0。这导致预期的竞争比率约为*e / (e - 1)*，这比简单的确定性算法更好。本文包含Python代码来模拟随机策略，但承认它正在用连续解来近似离散解。最后，它假设如果必须重复做出类似的决策，该算法可能会有所帮助。

title: How To Make (almost) Anything (2019)
summary: D. Sculley, a Google researcher leading machine learning teams in Cambridge, is participating in the "How To Make (almost) Anything" course to explore fabrication methods and potential cross-domain applications, particularly in biology and chemistry. His interest stems from his team's current projects which leverage machine learning for design and fabrication. He brings a diverse background to the course, including years of experience in machine learning (since 2003), prior experience as a teacher, and a visual and environmental studies ("art") undergraduate degree. He acknowledges his intention to make mistakes and welcomes discussions on machine learning. The syllabus outlines a comprehensive exploration of various fabrication techniques, spanning CAD & sketching to CNC machining, embedded programming, molding & casting, electronics design & production, 3D scanning & printing, and culminates in a final project after covering input and output devices, networking, machine week, application programming, and a wildcard week.
chinese_title: 如何制作（几乎）任何东西（2019）
chinese_summary: D. title: 6 weeks of Claude Code
summary:
This article reflects on the transformative impact of Claude Code on the author's software development workflow over six weeks, specifically within the Puzzmo engineering space. The author emphasizes a newfound "freedom of expression" in coding, decoupling them from writing every line of code while maintaining full responsibility for the final product. Comparing this to the "introduction of photography" for programming, the author believes Claude Code significantly accelerates development.

The primary benefit highlighted is the dramatically reduced cost of maintenance and addressing technical debt. The author details a substantial list of completed projects, including codebase conversions, system replacements, and infrastructure improvements, all accomplished as "side-projects" while working on their primary roadmap. This resulted in years of backlog being addressed in a little over a month and a half, without significant increase in work hours. This allows for quick exploration of ideas and the ability to "Write First, Decide Later".

The author also introduces the "Two Clones lifestyle," using two separate VS Code instances for independent pull request work. They explain how Claude Code has also changed Puzzmo's game development process, enabling designers to quickly prototype and deploy games. However, this raises concerns about maintaining code quality and integrating prototypes into the production pipeline.

The author also discusses the success internally and the importance of being a full-breadth developer. They attribute the success of Claude Code to Puzzmo's monorepo architecture, explicit tech choices, and the nature of their business as a test suite/benchmark for these models.

While the author acknowledges a lack of significant change in metrics like pull requests and lines of code, they firmly believe in the increased pace of change at Puzzmo. The author concludes by recommending a focus on effective Claude Code usage rather than obsessing over the latest LLM trends.
chinese_title: 克劳德代码六周
chinese_summary:
克劳德代码对Puzzmo工程师六周内软件开发工作流程的变革性影响。作者强调在编码中获得了前所未有的“表达自由”，无需编写每一行代码，同时对最终产品承担全部责任。作者将其比作编程界的“摄影术的引入”，认为克劳德代码显著加速了开发进程。

主要优点是大幅降低了维护和解决技术债务的成本。作者详细列举了一系列已完成的项目，包括代码库转换、系统替换和基础设施改进，这些项目都是在处理主要路线图的同时作为“副项目”完成的。这使得多年积压的工作在不到一个半月的时间内得以解决，而工作时间没有明显增加。这使得他们能够快速探索想法并“先编写，后决定”。

作者还介绍了“两个克隆体生活方式”，即使用两个独立的 VS Code 实例进行独立的拉取请求工作。他们解释了克劳德代码如何改变了 Puzzmo 的游戏开发流程，使设计师能够快速原型设计和部署游戏。然而，这也引发了人们对保持代码质量和将原型集成到生产流水线中的担忧。

作者还讨论了内部的成功以及成为一名全方位开发者的重要性。他们将克劳德代码的成功归功于 Puzzmo 的单一代码库架构、明确的技术选择以及其作为这些模型的测试套件/基准的业务性质。

虽然作者承认拉取请求和代码行数等指标没有发生显著变化，但他们坚信 Puzzmo 的变化步伐加快了。作者最后建议关注克劳德代码的有效使用，而不是沉迷于最新的 LLM 趋势。

title: Flourishing chemosynthetic life at the greatest depths of hadal trenches
summary:
This article reports the discovery of extensive chemosynthesis-based communities in the Kuril-Kamchatka and western Aleutian Trenches, some of Earth's deepest environments. Using the manned submersible Fendouzhe, researchers identified communities spanning 2,500 km at depths of 5,800 m to 9,533 m, dominated by siboglinid polychaetes and bivalves.

These communities are sustained by hydrogen sulfide and methane-rich fluids released through faults traversing deep sediment layers, where methane is produced microbially from deposited organic matter. Isotopic analysis supports this methane production mechanism.

The communities' species composition varies between the trenches and even within them. The Kuril-Kamchatka Trench features mostly frenulate siboglinids, while the Kamchatka Aleutian Transition is abundant in vesicomyid clams. Specific sites, such as "The Deepest" (9,533 m) and "Wintersweet Valley" (9,120 m), exhibit distinct species assemblages and densities.  The presence of *Tartarothyasira hadalis* in the Kuril-Kamchatka Trench marks the deepest occurrence of chemosymbiotrophic bivalves in hadal zones.

The discovery challenges existing models of life at extreme depths and carbon cycling in the deep ocean, suggesting that such communities might be more widespread in hadal trenches than previously thought due to geological similarities.  The study highlights the ecological significance of these previously underappreciated hadal ecosystems.
chinese_title: 海沟极深处繁盛的化能合成生命
chinese_summary:
本文报道了在千岛-堪察加和西阿留申海沟（地球上一些最深的环境）中发现的广泛的化能合成生物群落。研究人员利用载人潜水器“奋斗者”号，在5800米至9533米的深度识别出绵延2500公里的生物群落，这些生物群落主要由管状蠕虫和双壳类动物组成。

这些生物群落依靠富含硫化氢和甲烷的流体维持，这些流体通过贯穿深层沉积层的断层释放出来，甲烷是在那里由沉积的有机物通过微生物产生的。同位素分析支持这种甲烷生产机制。

这些生物群落的物种组成在海沟之间甚至在海沟内部都各不相同。千岛-堪察加海沟主要以缨鳃虫为主，而堪察加-阿留申过渡区则富含囊蛤。诸如“最深处”（9533米）和“冬馨谷”（9120米）等特定地点表现出不同的物种组合和密度。在千岛-堪察加海沟中发现的*Tartarothyasira hadalis*标志着在海沟带发现了最深处的化能共生双壳类动物。

这一发现挑战了现有的关于极端深度生命和深海碳循环的模型，表明由于地质相似性，这种生物群落可能比以前认为的更广泛地分布在海沟带中。该研究强调了这些以前未被充分认识的海沟生态系统的生态意义。

title: Lina Khan points to Figma IPO as vindication of M&A scrutiny
summary:
Lina Khan, former FTC chair, sees Figma's successful IPO as validation of her stricter approach to M&A scrutiny. Khan argues that allowing startups like Figma to grow independently generates more value than being acquired by larger companies, alluding to the failed $20 billion Adobe-Figma deal which faced regulatory challenges during her tenure.

While Adobe cited regulatory hurdles in Europe and the UK, the US also raised concerns about the acquisition stifling competition. Khan defended her aggressive stance against Big Tech acquisitions, claiming only a small percentage received intense scrutiny and that founders benefit from more potential acquirers.

Although Khan has departed from the FTC, her comments view the Figma IPO as beneficial for employees, investors, innovation, and the public. Critics, however, argue that Figma's success stems from its own innovation, not regulatory intervention. Wedbush Securities analyst Dan Ives, for example, attributed Figma's success to its innovative growth rather than the FTC's actions. The article highlights the ongoing debate about the role of regulatory scrutiny in the tech industry and its impact on startups.
chinese_title: 莉娜·可汗认为Figma首次公开募股证明并购审查是正确的
chinese_summary:
前联邦贸易委员会主席莉娜·汗认为Figma的成功上市验证了她对并购审查采取的更严格方式。 汗认为，允许像Figma这样的初创公司独立发展比被大公司收购更能产生价值，她指的是在她任期内面临监管挑战的、价值200亿美元的Adobe-Figma失败交易。

虽然Adobe引用了欧洲和英国的监管障碍，但美国也对收购扼杀竞争表示担忧。 汗为她对大型科技公司收购采取的强硬立场辩护，声称只有一小部分收购受到了严格审查，并且创始人可以从更多的潜在收购者中受益。

尽管汗已离开联邦贸易委员会，但她的评论认为Figma的首次公开募股对员工、投资者、创新和公众都有利。 然而，批评人士认为，Figma的成功源于其自身的创新，而非监管干预。 例如，Wedbush Securities分析师Dan Ives将Figma的成功归功于其创新增长，而不是联邦贸易委员会的行动。 这篇文章强调了关于监管审查在科技行业中的作用及其对初创企业的影响的持续辩论。

title: Micron rolls out 276-layer SSD trio for speed, scale, and stability
summary:
Micron has unveiled three new SSDs based on their Gen 9 276-layer 3D NAND technology, targeting distinct market needs: speed, capacity, and consistent performance.

The **9650** is a high-performance PCIe Gen 6 SSD using TLC flash, available in read-optimized "Pro" and mixed-use "Max" variants. It boasts speeds up to 28 GBps sequential reads and 14 GBps sequential writes, with up to 5.5 million/900,000 random read/write IOPS. Capacities range from 6.4 TB to 30.72 TB in E3.S and E1.S formats. It's aimed at accelerating AI training and inference and is significantly faster and more power-efficient than its predecessor, the 9550.

The **6600 ION** is a high-capacity PCIe Gen 5 SSD built with QLC flash. Aimed at bulk storage, it offers capacities up to 122.88 TB, succeeding the 6550 ION. While offering capacities up to 122.88 TB, its read/write speeds are slower compared to the 6550, trading speed for capacity. A 245 TB version is planned for 2026.

The **7600** is a PCIe Gen 5 TLC SSD focused on consistent low latency for applications like AI, databases, and cloud computing. It comes in Pro (read-intensive) and Max (mixed-use) versions, with capacities ranging from 1.6 TB to 15.36 TB, available in the U.2 format. While not the fastest, it balances performance and predictability.

All three SSDs feature Micron's in-house DRAM, NAND, controller, and firmware, and incorporate various security features. Samples of the 9650 and 7600 are currently shipping, while the 6600 ION 122 TB is expected in Q3 2025.
chinese_title: 美光推出276层SSD三剑客，兼顾速度、规模和稳定性
chinese_summary:
美光推出三款基于Gen 9 276层3D NAND技术的全新SSD，分别针对不同的市场需求：速度、容量和一致性性能。

这三款SSD均采用美光自研的DRAM、NAND、控制器和固件，并集成了各种安全功能。 9650和7600的样品目前正在发货，而6600 ION 122 TB预计将于2025年第三季度上市。

title: We may not like what we become if A.I. solves loneliness
summary:
This article explores the complex and potentially unsettling implications of AI companionship in addressing loneliness. The author, a psychology professor who previously argued in favor of empathic AI, acknowledges the concerns of those who see it as a soulless substitute for genuine human connection.

The piece highlights the pervasive nature and detrimental effects of loneliness, citing research linking it to various health problems and emotional distress. It argues that while ideal solutions involve human connection, the scarcity of real human attention makes AI companions a viable, if imperfect, alternative, particularly for the elderly or those lacking social support.

The author presents evidence suggesting that AI chatbots can, in some cases, provide surprisingly empathic responses, even outperforming human doctors in certain scenarios. This raises the possibility of AI acting as therapeutic companions, though concerns remain about the potential for deception and the lack of genuine human presence.

The author grapples with the ethical implications of widespread AI companionship, particularly for younger generations. While acknowledging the potential benefits for those severely lonely, the piece questions the long-term societal impact of readily available AI relationships on solitude, independent thought, and creativity. It also suggests that as AI becomes more adept at mimicking empathy, the line between person and program will blur, potentially leading to unforeseen psychological consequences and a reliance on simulated connection. Ultimately, the article raises profound questions about what it means to be human in a world where artificial companions are increasingly sophisticated and accessible.
chinese_title: 如果人工智能解决了孤独，我们可能不喜欢我们会变成什么样。
chinese_summary:
本文探讨了人工智能陪伴在解决孤独问题上复杂且可能令人不安的影响。作者是一位心理学教授，他之前曾论证支持具有同理心的人工智能。他承认那些认为人工智能是缺乏灵魂的、对真正人际关系的替代品的人的担忧。

文章强调了孤独的普遍性和有害影响，引用了将其与各种健康问题和情绪困扰联系起来的研究。文章认为，虽然理想的解决方案涉及人际交往，但由于真正的人类关注的稀缺，人工智能伴侣成为一种可行的（即使是不完美的）替代方案，特别是对于老年人或缺乏社会支持的人。

作者提出了证据表明，在某些情况下，人工智能聊天机器人可以提供出人意料的同理心回应，甚至在某些情况下胜过人类医生。这提出了人工智能充当治疗性伴侣的可能性，但人们仍然担心潜在的欺骗以及缺乏真正的人类存在。

作者探讨了广泛使用人工智能陪伴的伦理影响，特别是对于年轻一代。文章承认其对那些严重孤独的人的潜在好处，但质疑触手可及的人工智能关系对孤独、独立思考和创造力的长期社会影响。它还表明，随着人工智能越来越擅长模仿同理心，人与程序之间的界限将会变得模糊，可能导致无法预见的心理后果以及对模拟连接的依赖。最终，本文提出了深刻的问题，即在一个人工伴侣日益复杂和易于获得的世界中，成为人类意味着什么。

title: PixiEditor 2.0 – A FOSS universal 2D graphics editor
summary:
PixiEditor 2.0, launched on July 30, 2025, is a free and open-source "Universal 2D Editor," evolving from its pixel-art roots to handle raster, vector, animation, and procedural graphics. It aims to be highly configurable for diverse workflows, not just a Photoshop alternative.

Key features include switchable toolsets for painting, pixel art, and vector editing, allowing mixed graphics in a single file. Vector support includes high DPI editing with non-destructive layers and tools like path, line, ellipse, rectangle, and text. The powerful Node Graph enables complex effects and procedural animations, offering fine-grained control over image rendering. Pre-built node workspaces streamline workflows.

Animations can be frame-by-frame or procedurally generated, exportable as videos or spritesheets. The pixel art toolset includes a pixel-perfect brush, transform tools, and a non-destructive text tool.

To support full-time development, Pixi Labs Sp. z o.o. was established. A first paid extension, the Founder's Pack, offers workspaces like Card Builder, 3D Cube Texturing, Texture tiling, and Reusable Pixel-Art Animation, alongside unique palettes and an in-app badge. A live stream was held to showcase PixiEditor 2.0 and offer discounts.

While requiring a Vulkan-compatible GPU and 64-bit system, PixiEditor 2.0 is a significant upgrade. Version 1.0 is still available as a beta.
chinese_title: PixiEditor 2.0 – 一款 FOSS 通用 2D 图形编辑器
chinese_summary:

主要功能包括可切换的绘画、像素艺术和矢量编辑工具集，允许在单个文件中混合图形。矢量支持包括具有非破坏性图层的高 DPI 编辑以及路径、线条、椭圆、矩形和文本等工具。强大的节点图能够实现复杂的效果和程序动画，从而可以精细地控制图像渲染。预构建的节点工作区简化了工作流程。

动画可以是逐帧的或程序生成的，可以导出为视频或精灵表。像素艺术工具集包括像素完美的画笔、转换工具和非破坏性的文本工具。

为了支持全职开发，成立了 Pixi Labs Sp. z o.o.。第一个付费扩展包，创始人包，提供了卡片生成器、3D 立方体纹理、纹理平铺和可重用的像素艺术动画等工作区，以及独特的调色板和应用内徽章。举办了直播活动来展示 PixiEditor 2.0 并提供折扣。

虽然需要兼容 Vulkan 的 GPU 和 64 位系统，但 PixiEditor 2.0 是一次重大的升级。1.0 版本仍然作为测试版提供。

title: HTML-in-Canvas
summary:
This article introduces a proposal for new HTML Canvas APIs that allow rendering HTML content directly into a `<canvas>` element for both Canvas 2D and WebGL. The goal is to address the limitations of current canvas implementations, particularly in areas like styled text, accessibility, and the integration of HTML content with shaders.

The proposal includes several new APIs: `layoutsubtree` (a canvas attribute to enable layout of descendant elements), `drawElement` (Canvas 2D method to render an element and its subtree), `texElement2D` (WebGL method to render an element into a texture), and `setHitTestRegions` (both Canvas 2D and WebGL to redirect hit tests from the canvas to the drawn element, enabling interactivity). A `fireOnEveryPaint` option is also added to ResizeObserverOptions to notify when drawn elements' DOM state changes, triggering canvas redraws.

These APIs enable use cases such as richer text rendering in canvas, improved accessibility by ensuring the fallback content matches the rendered content, composing HTML elements with shaders, and rendering HTML content within 3D scenes.

The document also provides details on developer trials, including how to enable the feature in Chrome Canary and cautions about potential privacy issues during the trial phase. Developers are encouraged to provide feedback on what content works and fails, missing canvas rendering context support, and accessibility improvements. Demos showcase API usage in rendering HTML into a GL texture, and utilizing interactive elements within a canvas.
chinese_title: 画布中的HTML
chinese_summary:
本文介绍了一项关于新型 HTML Canvas API 的提案，该提案允许将 HTML 内容直接渲染到 `<canvas>` 元素中，适用于 Canvas 2D 和 WebGL。其目标是解决当前 canvas 实现的局限性，尤其是在样式化文本、可访问性以及 HTML 内容与着色器集成等领域。

该提案包括几个新的 API：`layoutsubtree`（一个 canvas 属性，用于启用后代元素的布局），`drawElement`（Canvas 2D 方法，用于渲染一个元素及其子树），`texElement2D`（WebGL 方法，用于将一个元素渲染成纹理）以及 `setHitTestRegions`（Canvas 2D 和 WebGL 均有，用于将点击测试从 canvas 重定向到绘制的元素，从而实现交互性）。此外，还向 ResizeObserverOptions 添加了一个 `fireOnEveryPaint` 选项，用于在绘制元素的 DOM 状态更改时发出通知，从而触发 canvas 重绘。

这些 API 能够实现诸如 canvas 中更丰富的文本渲染、通过确保回退内容与渲染内容匹配来改善可访问性、将 HTML 元素与着色器组合以及在 3D 场景中渲染 HTML 内容等用例。

该文档还提供了关于开发者试用的详细信息，包括如何在 Chrome Canary 中启用该功能以及有关试用阶段潜在隐私问题的注意事项。鼓励开发者就哪些内容有效和失败、缺失的 canvas 渲染上下文支持以及可访问性改进提供反馈。演示展示了 API 在将 HTML 渲染到 GL 纹理中以及在 canvas 中利用交互式元素方面的用法。

title: At a Loss for Words: A flawed idea is teaching kids to be poor readers (2019)
summary:
In "At a Loss for Words," Emily Hanford investigates how a flawed theory called "three cueing" is hindering reading education in American schools. This theory, popularized by Ken Goodman and Marie Clay, suggests readers use graphic, syntactic, and semantic cues to guess words, rather than decoding them. Hanford highlights Molly Woodworth's struggle with reading and her dismay at seeing her child taught the same ineffective strategies.

Cognitive scientists have debunked three cueing, demonstrating that skilled readers rely on quickly and accurately recognizing words as a sequence of letters, without heavy reliance on context. Research by Keith Stanovich confirmed that weaker readers depend more on context. Despite scientific evidence, three cueing persists in schools, influencing curriculum and teaching practices. This is evident in reader's workshop, where children are taught to use "picture power" and other context clues to guess words. The article argues that this approach makes it harder for children to learn to read proficiently. It connects poor reading skills to negative outcomes such as high school dropouts and involvement in the criminal justice system. The piece criticizes the continued investment in cueing-based teaching methods and calls for a shift towards scientifically-backed approaches for teaching reading.
chinese_title: 词穷语塞：一个有缺陷的理念正在教坏孩子们的阅读能力（2019）
chinese_summary:
在《失语症》中，艾米丽·汉福德调查了一种名为“三提示法”的错误理论如何阻碍美国学校的阅读教育。这种理论由肯·古德曼和玛丽·克莱推广，认为读者使用图像、句法和语义线索来猜测单词，而不是解码它们。汉福德着重讲述了莫莉·伍德沃思在阅读上的挣扎，以及她看到自己的孩子被教授同样无效的策略时的沮丧。

认知科学家已经驳斥了三提示法，证明熟练的读者依赖于快速、准确地识别单词作为一系列字母，而不过度依赖语境。基思·斯塔诺维奇的研究证实，较弱的读者更依赖语境。尽管有科学证据，三提示法仍然存在于学校中，影响着课程和教学实践。这在读者工作坊中很明显，孩子们被教导使用“图片力量”和其他语境线索来猜测单词。文章认为，这种方法使得孩子们更难学会熟练阅读。它将糟糕的阅读技能与负面结果联系起来，例如高中辍学和卷入刑事司法系统。文章批评了对基于提示的教学方法的持续投入，并呼吁转向基于科学的阅读教学方法。

title: C++26 Reflections adventures and compile-time UML
summary:
This article explores using C++26's reflection features to automatically generate UML diagrams from C++ code at compile time. The author tackles the problem of manually creating UML diagrams, which is often tedious and time-consuming, by leveraging the new `lift` (^^) and `splice` operators to reflect on C++ types and their members.

The core idea revolves around a `make_class_graph` function template that uses `std::meta::info` to represent reflected types and values. This function recursively traverses the members of a class, extracting information about their types and relationships. A key challenge is managing the "meta" space, where reflections of types and values are both represented as `std::meta::info`, requiring checks using `std::meta::is_type` to determine the kind of reflection being handled.

The generated UML diagram is built as a string at compile time using `std::define_static_string`, which converts a compile-time `std::string` into a string literal that can be returned from a `consteval` function. The author also discusses the use of `std::meta::access_context` to manage access rules during reflection.  Finally, functions such as `std::meta::nonstatic_data_members_of` and `std::meta::info::display_string_of` are used to access class members and their names. The author acknowledges the slight complexity introduced by needing to differentiate between type and value reflections but considers it a worthwhile trade-off for the power of C++26's reflection capabilities. The output is a PlantUML diagram ready for visualization.

核心思想围绕一个`make_class_graph`函数模板展开，该模板使用`std::meta::info`来表示反射的类型和值。此函数递归地遍历类的成员，提取有关其类型和关系的信息。一个关键挑战是管理“元”空间，其中类型的反射和值的反射都表示为`std::meta::info`，需要使用`std::meta::is_type`来确定正在处理的反射类型。

生成的UML图在编译时使用`std::define_static_string`构建为字符串，该函数将编译时`std::string`转换为可以从`consteval`函数返回的字符串字面量。作者还讨论了使用`std::meta::access_context`来管理反射期间的访问规则。最后，使用`std::meta::nonstatic_data_members_of`和`std::meta::info::display_string_of`等函数来访问类成员及其名称。作者承认需要区分类型反射和值反射带来了一点复杂性，但认为这对于C++26反射功能的强大性来说是值得的。 输出是可供可视化的 PlantUML 图。

title: LangExtract: Python library for extracting structured data from language models
summary:
LangExtract is a Python library that utilizes LLMs to extract structured information from unstructured text based on user-defined instructions and examples. It excels at tasks like clinical note processing, identifying key details, and maintaining a consistent output schema.

Key features include precise source grounding (mapping extractions to their origin), reliable structured outputs via controlled generation, optimized processing for long documents via chunking and parallel processing, interactive visualization for review, flexible LLM support (cloud-based and local like Ollama), and adaptability to various domains without fine-tuning.

The library requires defining a prompt and providing examples to guide the model. It supports models like Gemini and OpenAI (with specific configuration needs). Results can be saved in JSONL format and visualized via an interactive HTML.

Installation can be done via pip (PyPI), from source, or using Docker. Using cloud models requires an API key, which can be set through environment variables, a `.env` file, or (less ideally) directly in the code.

The documentation provides example use cases, including Romeo and Juliet full text extraction, medication extraction, and radiology report structuring (RadExtract demo). Contributions are welcome, and the project utilizes automated formatting tools and pre-commit hooks to maintain code style. The library is distributed under the Apache 2.0 License, with additional terms for health-related applications.

title: Descent of Inanna into the Underworld
summary:
The "Descent of Inanna into the Underworld" is a Sumerian myth (with an Akkadian version titled "Descent of Ishtar into the Underworld") detailing the goddess Inanna's journey to the Underworld to challenge her sister Ereshkigal, the Queen of the Dead. Inanna's descent leads to her death and suspension as a corpse until Enki intervenes, restoring her to life. However, her return requires a substitute, leading to her spouse Dumuzi being sent to the Underworld. Later, due to his sister Geshtinanna's pleas, Dumuzi's sentence is lessened to spending only part of the year in the Underworld, with his sister taking his place for the remaining time.

The myth exists in Sumerian and Akkadian versions, the latter discovered first. The Sumerian version, older and longer, required extensive reconstruction from tablet fragments. Initially, scholars misinterpreted Inanna's motive as searching for Dumuzi, influenced by the Orpheus myth. However, it was later understood that she sought to expand her power.

Key characters include Inanna (Ishtar), a multi-faceted goddess of love, war, and fertility; Ereshkigal, the static Queen of the Underworld; Gugalanna, Ereshkigal's husband; Namtar, her vizier and deity of disease; and Enki, the god of freshwater and wisdom who restores Inanna to life. The galatura and kurgara, beings of ambiguous gender, also play a role, navigating the Underworld to appease Ereshkigal.

The myth offers insights into Mesopotamian culture, influencing later civilizations and providing material for psychoanalytic theory. Recent re-examinations suggest Inanna herself intervened for Dumuzi's seasonal return, highlighting the ongoing interpretation and evolution of the story.
chinese_title: 伊南娜下冥府
chinese_summary:
《伊南娜下冥界》是苏美尔神话（阿卡德版本标题为《伊什塔尔下冥界》），讲述了女神伊南娜前往冥界挑战她的姐姐、亡灵女王埃列什基伽勒的故事。伊南娜的下行导致她的死亡和作为尸体的悬挂，直到恩基介入，让她复活。然而，她的回归需要一个替代者，导致她的配偶杜牧兹被送往冥界。后来，由于他妹妹格什廷安娜的恳求，杜牧兹的刑期被缩短为一年中只有一部分时间在冥界度过，他的妹妹在剩余的时间里代替他。

这个神话有苏美尔语和阿卡德语版本，后者首先被发现。苏美尔语版本更古老也更长，需要从石板碎片中进行大量重建。最初，学者们误解了伊南娜的动机是寻找杜牧兹，受到了俄耳甫斯神话的影响。然而，后来人们了解到她寻求扩张自己的权力。

主要人物包括：伊南娜（伊什塔尔），一位多面女神，掌管爱情、战争和生育；埃列什基伽勒，静止的冥界女王；古迦兰纳，埃列什基伽勒的丈夫；南塔尔，她的维齐尔和疾病之神；以及恩基，淡水和智慧之神，他使伊南娜复活。格拉图拉和库尔加拉，性别模糊的存在，也发挥了作用，在冥界穿梭以安抚埃列什基伽勒。

这个神话提供了对美索不达米亚文化的洞见，影响了后来的文明，并为精神分析理论提供了素材。最近的重新审视表明，伊南娜本人介入了杜牧兹的季节性回归，突出了故事的持续解读和演变。

title: Seed7 – The Extensible Programming Language
summary:
Seed7 is a general-purpose, extensible programming language designed by Thomas Mertes, aiming for a higher level of abstraction compared to languages like Ada, C/C++, and Java. Both an interpreter and compiler (translating to C) are available as open-source software.

Key features include the ability to define new statements and operators easily, and the use of first-class types, allowing for elegant templates and generics without special syntax. Object orientation is selectively implemented where advantageous. Seed7 draws inspiration from Pascal, Ada, C, C++, and Java.

Seed7 boasts features like user-defined statements/operators, predefined constructs defined in libraries, interfaces and multiple dispatch for object orientation, static type checking, no automatic casts, and automatic memory management *without* garbage collection. It also supports exception handling, debugging, overflow detection for integer computations, and unlimited-size numbers (bigInteger, bigRational). Function, operator, and statement overloading is supported, alongside various predefined types.

Seed7 aims for source code portability across operating systems and offers a database-independent API compatible with multiple databases. It runs under Linux, various Unix versions, and Windows. The interpreter and example programs are GPL licensed, while the runtime library is LGPL licensed.
chinese_title: Seed7 – 可扩展的程序设计语言
chinese_summary:

主要特性包括轻松定义新语句和运算符的能力，以及使用一等类型，从而无需特殊语法即可实现优雅的模板和泛型。 对象导向有选择性地在有利的地方实现。 Seed7 从 Pascal、Ada、C、C++ 和 Java 中汲取灵感。

Seed7 拥有诸如用户定义的语句/运算符、库中定义的预定义构造、用于对象导向的接口和多重分派、静态类型检查、无自动类型转换以及 *没有* 垃圾回收的自动内存管理等特性。 它还支持异常处理、调试、整数计算的溢出检测以及无限大小的数字（bigInteger、bigRational）。 支持函数、运算符和语句重载，以及各种预定义类型。

Seed7 旨在实现跨操作系统的源代码可移植性，并提供与多个数据库兼容的独立于数据库的 API。 它可以在 Linux、各种 Unix 版本和 Windows 下运行。 解释器和示例程序采用 GPL 许可，而运行时库采用 LGPL 许可。

title: Show HN: My Bytecode Optimizer Beats Copilot by 2X
summary:
This "Show HN" article presents a side-project called SuperVM, a bytecode optimizer, and compares its performance against Copilot (specifically GPT-4o and Sonnet) on a simple fractal generator task. The author, Deviant/Abstraction, argues that specialized tools can outperform general-purpose AI models, even at an early stage of development.

The experiment involved giving Copilot the prompt "make it faster" for a hand-coded fractal generator and comparing the resulting frames per second (FPS) against the original code and SuperVM's output. SuperVM achieved an average of 99.8 FPS, doubling the original 13.8 FPS, and significantly exceeding Copilot's 49.3 FPS. The key difference is SuperVM's ability to directly edit bytecode and leverage formal proofs for optimization.

summary:
This Computing Magazine article, "EHRs – The Hidden Distraction in Your Doctor's Office," examines the U.S.'s $100 billion investment in Electronic Health Record (EHR) systems since 2004, revealing both progress and persistent problems. This led to widespread implementation but also created fragmented "electronic silos" due to a lack of interoperability standards and the presence of diverse EHR systems across different specialists.

The rush to adopt EHRs under HITECH incentives overlooked critical systems-engineering principles and human-centered design, resulting in costly, poorly designed, and insecure systems. These issues contribute to clinician burnout, data breaches, and new sources of medical errors. Furthermore, the article points out the unintended consequence of doctors spending excessive time, an average of 4.5 hours a day, on data entry, detracting from patient interaction and professional satisfaction. The Firefox extension has a content script (`content.js`) to identify YouTube video pages, a background script (`background.js`) to communicate with the Go backend API, and a popup interface (`popup.html/js`) for manual data fetching.

To use Starchive, you first start the Go backend (`go run .`), then load the Firefox extension. Visiting a YouTube video page then automatically triggers the archiving process. The system requires `yt-dlp`, `ffmpeg`, and Go to function. The author explicitly states this project is not associated with the website starchive.io.

title: Compressing Icelandic name declension patterns into a 3.27 kB trie
summary:
This article details the creation of a JavaScript library for applying grammatical cases to Icelandic personal names. Icelandic uses declension, changing noun forms based on grammatical case, which is challenging as names are typically stored in the nominative case. The author addresses this by creating a library that derives declension rules from public Icelandic data, specifically the Database of Icelandic Morphology (DIM) and the Personal Names Register.

The library compresses the data into a trie-like data structure to minimize bundle size. The initial approach involved storing declension data as an array of name forms, but this proved too large. A more efficient "suffix encoding" method was implemented, storing the longest common prefix and suffixes for each name's forms. A trie data structure is used to map reversed name strings to these suffix encodings, grouping names with similar endings. Trie compression is then applied, consolidating subtrees with common values, further reducing data size.

The compression leads to generalization; the library can now handle names not explicitly in the initial dataset by recognizing patterns in suffixes. The final library achieves a bundle size under 4.5kB gzipped, making it suitable for inclusion in web applications without significantly increasing their size, and allowing for correct grammatical case usage for Icelandic names in user interfaces.

该库将数据压缩成类似 Trie 树的数据结构，以最大限度地减少包大小。最初的方法是将变格数据存储为名称形式的数组，但事实证明这太大了。因此实施了一种更有效的“后缀编码”方法，为每个名称的形式存储最长公共前缀和后缀。Trie 树数据结构用于将反转的名称字符串映射到这些后缀编码，从而对具有相似结尾的名称进行分组。然后应用 Trie 树压缩，合并具有公共值的子树，从而进一步减小数据大小。

这种压缩导致了泛化；该库现在可以通过识别后缀中的模式来处理初始数据集中未明确包含的名称。最终的库实现了小于 4.5kB（gzip 压缩后）的包大小，使其适合包含在 Web 应用程序中，而不会显着增加其大小，并允许在用户界面中正确使用冰岛语名称的语法格。

title: The /o in Ruby regex stands for "oh the humanity "
summary:
This article delves into the obscure and potentially dangerous Ruby regex modifier `/o`, revealing its surprising behavior and the potential for introducing confounding bugs. The author recounts a debugging experience where the `/o` modifier caused unexpected caching of the first interpolated value in a regex, leading to incorrect matching.

The core issue is that `/o` (Interpolation Mode) caches the compiled regex object after its first evaluation, using that same regex for all subsequent calls, even with different input. This behavior is explained using Ruby VM bytecode analysis, showing that the `once` instruction ensures the regex is only evaluated once ever, within the entire Ruby process.

The article demonstrates the implications of this caching, including non-deterministic behavior in multithreaded scenarios and unexpected results in recursive calls. The author strongly advises against using the `/o` modifier, arguing that the potential performance gains are outweighed by the risks of unpredictable behavior.

Finally, the article reveals a way to force re-evaluation of the `/o` modifier: reloading the code, as this triggers a complete re-evaluation by Ruby. chinese_title: Ruby 正则表达式中的 /o 代表 “天啊，人类啊！”

核心问题在于，`/o`（插值模式）会在首次评估后缓存已编译的正则表达式对象，并在所有后续调用中使用相同的正则表达式，即使输入不同。通过Ruby VM字节码分析解释了这种行为，表明`once`指令确保正则表达式在整个Ruby进程中只被评估一次。

本文展示了这种缓存的含义，包括多线程场景中的不确定行为以及递归调用中的意外结果。作者强烈建议不要使用`/o`修饰符，认为潜在的性能提升不如不可预测行为的风险。

最后，本文揭示了一种强制重新评估`/o`修饰符的方法：重新加载代码，因为这会触发Ruby的完全重新评估。虽然本文提供了一瞥Ruby内部机制的机会，但其中心信息是对使用`/o`修饰符的明确警告，因为它可能引入难以调试的问题。

title: Microsoft is open sourcing Windows 11's UI framework
summary:
Microsoft is taking steps to open-source its Windows 11 user interface framework, WinUI, but it's a phased approach due to its complexity and deep integration with proprietary Windows components. The company aims for a more open and collaborative future with WinUI, but it's not an instant switch.

Over the next six months, Microsoft will progress through four phases:
1. **Increased Mirror Frequency:** More frequent mirroring of internal code changes to the public GitHub repository, starting after the WASDK 1.8 release (end of August).
2. **Local Builds:** External developers will be able to clone and build the WinUI repository locally, with provided documentation.
3. **Contributions and Testing:** Third-party developers will be able to submit pull requests (PRs) and run tests locally, as Microsoft disentangles private dependencies.
4. **GitHub as Center of Gravity:** GitHub will become the primary hub for development, issue tracking, and community interaction, phasing out internal mirrors.

Microsoft emphasizes that security, stability, and support for existing products remain priorities. The progress can be tracked on a GitHub board. Developers can contribute by providing feedback, reporting well-documented issues, and upvoting existing suggestions. The open-sourcing process is deliberate and incremental.

title: Falcon-H1: A Family of Hybrid-Head Models Redefining Efficiency and Performance
summary:
This technical report introduces Falcon-H1, a new family of large language models (LLMs) designed for both high performance and efficiency. The key innovation lies in its hybrid architecture, combining Transformer-based attention with State Space Models (SSMs) to leverage the strengths of both: Transformer's general capabilities and SSM's long-context memory and computational efficiency.

A core claim is that Falcon-H1 models achieve state-of-the-art performance with exceptional parameter and training efficiency. The flagship 34B model reportedly matches or surpasses the performance of models up to 70B in scale (Qwen3-32B, Qwen2.5-72B, and Llama3.3-70B) while using fewer parameters and less training data. Smaller models also demonstrate impressive results, with the 1.5B-Deep model rivaling current 7B-10B models and the 0.5B model performing similarly to typical 7B models from 2024.

The models exhibit strong capabilities in reasoning, mathematics, multilingual tasks, instruction following, and scientific knowledge, and support up to 256K context tokens and 18 languages. The Falcon-H1 models are released under a permissive open-source license, facilitating broader access and impact in AI research. The authors revisited the model design, data strategy, and training dynamics, challenging conventional practices in LLM development.

title: Hiding secret codes in light protects against fake videos
summary:
Cornell researchers have developed a new method to combat fake videos by "watermarking" light sources with nearly imperceptible fluctuations that encode a secret code. This hidden watermark is captured in any video recorded under the watermarked light, allowing fact-checkers to verify the authenticity of the footage and detect manipulation.

The system works by embedding information into the light emitted from sources like computer screens and lamps, creating a "code video" alongside the regular footage. This code video contains a time-stamped version of the unmanipulated scene under slightly different lighting. If the video is altered, inconsistencies arise between the manipulated sections and the code video, revealing the tampering. Even AI-generated fake videos produce random variations in the code video, making them easily identifiable.

The watermarks are designed to be undetectable to the human eye by mimicking natural "noise" in light. The system is adaptable, working with various light sources through software coding or small computer chips. Researchers have successfully implemented multiple codes in a single scene, making it even harder for malicious actors to fake the light. While promising, the team cautions that the fight against misinformation is ongoing and adversaries will likely adapt.

该系统的工作原理是将信息嵌入到计算机屏幕和灯具等光源发出的光中，从而在常规视频之外创建一个“代码视频”。这个代码视频包含一个带有时间戳的，在略微不同的光照条件下拍摄的未被篡改场景的版本。如果视频被篡改，被篡改的部分和代码视频之间会出现不一致，从而揭示篡改行为。即使是人工智能生成的虚假视频也会在代码视频中产生随机变化，使其易于识别。

title: Kano Model
summary:
The Kano model, developed by Noriaki Kano, is a theory for product development and customer satisfaction that helps organizations prioritize development efforts. It categorizes customer preferences into five types, each influencing satisfaction differently:

1.  **Must-be Quality:** Basic requirements customers expect; their presence leads to neutrality, while their absence causes dissatisfaction (e.g., functioning brakes in a car).
2.  **One-dimensional Quality:** Attributes that cause satisfaction when fulfilled and dissatisfaction when not, often the focus of competition (e.g., more milk in a package for the same price).
3.  **Attractive Quality:** Unexpected features that delight customers when present but do not cause dissatisfaction when absent (e.g., advanced parking sensors in a car).
4.  **Indifferent Quality:** Attributes that neither satisfy nor dissatisfy customers (e.g., the thickness of wax coating on a milk carton).
5.  **Reverse Quality:** Attributes where a high degree of achievement leads to dissatisfaction, as not all customers desire extra features (e.g., excessive jargon in a call center).

Customer expectations evolve, causing attributes to shift from "delighters" to basic needs over time. The Kano model is measured using a standardized questionnaire asking about functional (positive) and dysfunctional (negative) aspects of features. Combining the answers reveals the feature category. The model is used in Quality Function Deployment (QFD) to improve product quality by understanding customer preferences and supporting product specification discussions.
chinese_title: 卡诺模型
chinese_summary:
狩野模型，由狩野纪昭开发，是一种用于产品开发和客户满意度的理论，它帮助组织确定开发工作的优先级。它将客户偏好分为五种类型，每种类型对满意度的影响各不相同：

1.  **必备品质：** 客户期望的基本要求；其存在只会导致中性，而缺失会导致不满（例如，汽车中正常工作的刹车）。
2.  **一维品质：** 当满足时会引起满意，不满足时会引起不满的属性，通常是竞争的焦点（例如，相同价格的包装中含有更多的牛奶）。
3.  **魅力品质：** 存在时会让客户愉悦的意外功能，但缺失时不会引起不满（例如，汽车中的高级停车传感器）。
4.  **无关紧要的品质：** 既不会让客户满意也不会让客户不满意的属性（例如，牛奶纸盒上蜡涂层的厚度）。
5.  **反向品质：** 过高的成就度会导致不满意的属性，因为并非所有客户都希望有额外的功能（例如，呼叫中心中过多的术语）。

客户期望会不断发展，导致属性随着时间的推移从“令人愉悦的功能”转变为基本需求。狩野模型通过标准化的问卷调查来衡量，询问功能的正面（积极）和负面（消极）方面。结合答案可以揭示功能类别。该模型用于质量功能展开（QFD），通过了解客户偏好并支持产品规格讨论来提高产品质量。

title: How Social Media Shortens Your Life and How to Expand It
summary:
This article argues that social media platforms are deliberately designed to shorten our perceived and actual lives by stealing our time and impairing our awareness and memory. Social media achieves this through techniques borrowed from casino design, turning feeds into "curvilinear mazes" that keep users passively scrolling without a clear beginning or end, disrupting their sense of time.

The author explains how social media hinders both present awareness and retrospective memory. The constant stream of alarming but ultimately routine content desensitizes the brain, making it difficult to remember what was seen. Furthermore, features like infinite scroll and autoplay lull users into passivity, while notifications and the sheer volume of information divide attention, leading to anxiety, stress, and a "switch-cost effect."

The article connects social media use to negative impacts on health, including disrupted sleep cycles, mental health problems, and potentially accelerated aging. By living out of sync with reality due to constant disorientation, our biological life might also be shortened.

The author proposes escaping this trap by abstaining from social media and being aware of similar time-warping tactics in other technologies like chatbots. The key is to avoid getting lost in "curvilinear mazes" and instead pursuing clear, intentional destinations to maintain awareness and control of our time. Ultimately, reclaiming time is not just about resisting specific platforms but also about resisting design patterns that manipulate our attention.

title: Double-slit experiment holds up when stripped to its quantum essentials
summary:
MIT physicists have conducted an idealized version of the double-slit experiment, confirming the fundamental principles of quantum mechanics and settling a long-standing debate between Einstein and Bohr. The double-slit experiment famously demonstrates that light can behave as both a wave and a particle, but these properties cannot be observed simultaneously.

The MIT team used individual atoms as slits and weak light beams to scatter single photons. By manipulating the quantum states of the atoms, they could control the information obtained about the photons' paths. Their findings confirmed that increasing the knowledge of a photon's path (particle nature) diminished the visibility of the wave-like interference pattern.

This experiment provides strong support for Bohr's interpretation of quantum mechanics, contradicting Einstein's idea that one could simultaneously observe both wave and particle properties by detecting the force exerted by a photon on a slit. The team also demonstrated that the "springs" (representing the method of holding the slits) previously used in conceptualizing the experiment are not crucial; the key factor is the "fuzziness" or uncertainty of the atom's location. This idealized setup, working at the single-atom and single-photon level, reinforces the counterintuitive nature of quantum mechanics and its impact on our understanding of reality. With their experiment, the researchers provide a more profound description that uses quantum correlations between photons and atoms.

title: Super-resolution of Sentinel-2 images (10M –> 5M)
summary:
This document describes a user-friendly desktop application, "Sentinel-2 Super-Resolution GUI," designed to enhance the resolution of Sentinel-2 satellite images from 10m to 5m. It uses a pre-trained AI model (REC_Real_L1B.safetensors) to upscale the Blue, Green, Red, and Near-Infrared (NIR) bands.

The application features a simple graphical interface, eliminating the need for command-line tools. Users load the model and four Sentinel-2 band files (B02, B03, B04, B08) in TIFF format with a UTM coordinate system. After processing, a 2x super-resolution image is generated, and a preview is displayed allowing users to compare the upscaled image with the original by clicking and holding on the preview. An optional unsharp mask filter can be applied for visual sharpening.

Output can be saved as a GeoTIFF (preserving geographic data) or a JPG with a JGW world file for GIS compatibility. The application requires Python 3 and libraries like `pyqt5`, `torch`, `safetensors`, `rasterio`, `pillow`, and `numpy`. GPU acceleration via CUDA is recommended for faster processing. An alternative version, `L1-BSR-GUI-ONNX.py`, uses OnnxRuntime for inference and requires a reduced set of libraries and an Onnx model.

The application is based on the L1BSR project and is licensed under the GNU General Public License v3.0.

title: A dive into open chat protocols
summary:
The article describes a website's implementation of "Anubis," a security measure designed to deter AI companies from aggressively scraping its content. The administrator believes such scraping causes downtime and makes resources inaccessible.

Anubis uses a "Proof-of-Work" scheme, similar to Hashcash, which requires users to perform a small computation to prove they are not a bot. While the computational load is minimal for individual users, it becomes significant for large-scale scrapers, making scraping more expensive.

The article emphasizes that Anubis is a temporary solution. The ultimate goal is to develop more sophisticated fingerprinting and identification techniques for headless browsers (often used by scrapers) based on characteristics like font rendering. This would allow the website to present the "Proof-of-Work" challenge only to suspicious users, minimizing inconvenience for legitimate visitors.

The text also notes that Anubis requires JavaScript and users may need to disable plugins like JShelter to pass the challenge. This requirement stems from the fact that AI companies have altered the expected behavior of website hosting, making such measures necessary. A "no-JS" solution is being considered for the future.

“阿努比斯”采用类似于Hashcash的“工作量证明”机制，要求用户执行少量计算来证明其不是机器人。虽然对单个用户来说，计算量很小，但对于大规模抓取者来说，计算量会变得非常显著，从而增加抓取的成本。

本文强调，“阿努比斯”只是一个临时解决方案。最终目标是开发更复杂的指纹识别和身份识别技术，针对无头浏览器（通常被抓取器使用），基于字体渲染等特征进行识别。这样，网站就可以只向可疑用户显示“工作量证明”挑战，从而最大限度地减少对合法访问者的不便。

文章还指出，“阿努比斯”需要JavaScript，用户可能需要禁用JShelter等插件才能通过挑战。这一要求源于人工智能公司改变了网站托管的预期行为，使得采取此类措施成为必要。未来正在考虑采用“无JavaScript”的解决方案。

title: Benchmarks in CI: Escaping the Cloud Chaos
summary:
This article addresses the challenges of running reliable performance benchmarks in Continuous Integration (CI) environments, particularly due to the "noisy neighbor" problem in cloud-hosted runners like GitHub Actions.  It highlights the importance of catching performance regressions early to prevent negative impacts on user experience, cost, and development efficiency.

The author demonstrates that GitHub-hosted runners have a high coefficient of variation (2.66%) leading to a significant false positive rate (45%) when trying to detect even small (2%) performance regressions. This makes performance gates unreliable and erodes trust in the benchmarking process.

To combat this, the article introduces "CodSpeed Macro Runners," a solution built on bare-metal instances with OS-level optimizations designed for high-precision benchmarking. These Macro Runners drastically reduce variance (0.56%), leading to a much lower false positive rate. Using the same 2% performance gate, the false positive rate drops to 0.04%.

The article emphasizes that minimal changes are required to integrate CodSpeed Macro Runners into existing CI workflows, primarily by changing the `runs-on` field in GitHub Actions.  It concludes by advocating for reliable performance data in CI to improve user experience, lower costs, enhance developer feedback loops, and reduce post-deployment debugging. It also promises a future deep dive into the technical details of their infrastructure.

title: Show HN: NaturalCron – Human-Readable Scheduling for .NET (With Fluent Builder)
summary:
NaturalCron is a .NET library designed to simplify scheduling tasks by using human-readable expressions instead of complex cron strings. It aims to improve code readability and reduce errors by allowing developers to define schedules with intuitive syntax, like "every 30 minutes in [jan, jun] between 09:00 and 18:00".

Key features include support for ranges, weekday lists, first/last day handling, and time zone support using IANA TZ names. NaturalCron is not a cron converter but a new expressive syntax that focuses on enhanced readability.

The library provides two ways to define schedules:

*   **Using Expressions:** Parsing a string-based human-readable expression.
*   **Using a Fluent Builder API:** A strongly-typed API for .NET developers with IntelliSense support.

The article showcases examples comparing cron expressions with NaturalCron expressions for common scheduling tasks. It also includes installation instructions (`dotnet add package NaturalCron`), documentation links, and encourages contributions and support for the project. Finally, it highlights that this approach eliminates the need for online cron expression generators.

He cites statistics showing a significant drop in men reporting having at least six close friends, coupled with a rise in those reporting zero friends. This lack of social connection contributes to issues like deaths of despair, addiction, misogyny, and overall inadequacy as partners, employees, and citizens.

Galloway emphasizes the importance of surrounding oneself with impressive, good people and actively seeking out new friendships at any age. He challenges the tendency to become socially stagnant as one gets older, advocating for pushing beyond comfort zones and being open to new connections. He shares anecdotes about forming friendships later in life, including initiating contact with individuals he admired.

The article also touches on Galloway's personal experiences, highlighting how his perspective on friendships with women has evolved. He encourages readers to overcome insecurities and not be intimidated by others, as he once was. He concludes by emphasizing the enriching nature of life and the value of continually expanding one's social circle to learn and grow. The article serves as a promotion for his new book, "Notes on Being a Man", and includes comments from readers sharing their own experiences and perspectives on the importance of friendship.

title: Robert Wilson has died
summary:
Robert Wilson, the highly influential experimental playwright, director, and visual artist, has died at the age of 83 at his home in Water Mill, New York, after a short illness. Known for his visually striking and stylised theatrical productions, Wilson collaborated with a diverse range of artists, including Philip Glass, Laurie Anderson, Marina Abramović, and Lady Gaga.

Throughout his six-decade career, Wilson's productions, such as "Deafman Glance" and "Einstein on the Beach" (with Philip Glass), challenged theatrical norms and gained international acclaim. His distinctive style, which rejected naturalism, incorporated elements of silent film, mime, and minimalist stage design, emphasizing the importance of visual elements alongside text and music.

Beyond theatre, Wilson was a prolific visual artist, creating drawings, sculptures, and video portraits. His Video Portraits series, featuring celebrities like Lady Gaga, Brad Pitt, and Winona Ryder in the style of classical paintings, was exhibited at prestigious institutions like the Louvre. He also designed exhibitions, notably the Giorgio Armani retrospective at the Guggenheim.

Born in a conservative Texas environment, Wilson studied dance and architecture before forming the Byrd Hoffman School of Byrds and staging performances in New York City. In 1992, he founded the Watermill Center, a prominent arts organization on Long Island, known for its annual benefit gala. Wilson consistently cited architecture as a major influence, emphasizing the fundamental role of light in creating space and shaping his artistic vision.
chinese_title: 罗伯特·威尔逊去世了
chinese_summary:
极具影响力的实验剧作家、导演和视觉艺术家罗伯特·威尔逊因病于纽约州水磨坊的家中去世，享年83岁。他以其视觉冲击力强、风格化的戏剧作品而闻名，曾与菲利普·格拉斯、劳里·安德森、玛丽娜·阿布拉莫维奇和Lady Gaga等众多艺术家合作。

在长达六十年的职业生涯中，威尔逊的作品，如《聋人一瞥》和（与菲利普·格拉斯合作的）《海滩上的爱因斯坦》，挑战了戏剧规范并获得了国际赞誉。他独特的风格摒弃了自然主义，融合了默片、哑剧和极简主义舞台设计的元素，强调了视觉元素与文本和音乐的重要性。

除了戏剧，威尔逊还是一位多产的视觉艺术家，创作了绘画、雕塑和录像肖像。他的录像肖像系列，以 Lady Gaga、布拉德·皮特和薇诺娜·瑞德等名人为特色，采用古典绘画的风格，曾在卢浮宫等著名机构展出。他还设计展览，尤其是古根海姆博物馆的乔治·阿玛尼回顾展。

威尔逊出生于德克萨斯州一个保守的环境中，在成立伯德·霍夫曼·伯德学校并在纽约市进行表演之前，他学习了舞蹈和建筑学。1992 年，他在长岛创立了水磨坊艺术中心，该中心以其年度慈善晚会而闻名。威尔逊一直认为建筑是他的主要影响，强调光在创造空间和塑造他的艺术视野中的根本作用。

title: How I do support and community
summary:
This article details the author's philosophy and practical approach to customer support and community building for their software, Kinopio.  The author sees support not as a cost-cutting exercise, but as a valuable opportunity to build a strong, engaged community. They strive to provide excellent service, drawing an analogy to running a high-quality hotel where customer experience is paramount.

The author balances coding and community engagement, acknowledging the tension between focusing on software improvements and attending to user needs.  They actively embrace user contact through email, Discord chat, and a Discourse forum, each serving different purposes. They emphasize the importance of proactively managing and organizing these communication channels, a practice they call "constant pruning."

Key strategies include welcoming new community members, directing conversations to appropriate channels (email, chat, or forum) based on their nature and urgency, and prioritizing the forum for long-term discussion and knowledge capture. The author acknowledges the effort required to shift communication types, framing it as a filter for user commitment.

Ultimately, the author advocates for a long-term view of customer support.  They prioritize treating existing customers well and believe it is essential for building a sustainable and lasting company. They see personalized support and community engagement as vital differentiators in a market saturated with automated solutions. They highlight the importance of being "many:many," rather than "1:many."

关键策略包括欢迎新社区成员，根据其性质和紧急程度将对话引导至适当的渠道（电子邮件、聊天或论坛），并优先考虑论坛进行长期讨论和知识积累。作者承认转换沟通类型所需的努力，将其视为用户承诺的过滤器。

最终，作者提倡对客户支持采取长远的眼光。他们优先考虑善待现有客户，并认为这对于建立可持续和持久的公司至关重要。他们认为个性化的支持和社区参与是在一个充斥着自动化解决方案的市场中重要的差异化因素。他们强调成为“多对多”的重要性，而不是“一对多”。
